title: Why can't I set the date and time on my HUAWEI MediaPad 7 Youth 2?
answer:
You may have set your HUAWEI MediaPad 7 Youth 2 to use the network date and time. To manually set the date and time:

1.l On the home screen, touch ![](http://app.huawei.com/tkb/ha-i/36a1b_gzpss.png)Settings > Date & time. 

1.l Clear the Automatic date & time check box.

[![](http://app.huawei.com/tkb/ha-i/36a1c_cd1xe.png)](http://app.huawei.com/tkb/ha-i/36a1c_cd1xe.png)

1.l Follow the onscreen instructions to set the date and time
